--- In gladiator@y..., "Rory Wilde" <laughingmadman@h...> wrote:
> what are u fighting against druids in? having them in the tourney?

One of my newest scenarios that I created for my set.  It's a lot 
different from the last encouncter (#122) with druids (that was almost 
nightmarish).  I'm actually trying to achieve a really high score on 
that scenario.  So far, I haven't quite cracked 5 million (or is it 
5 hundred thousand?) on that scenario (it's not that loaded with 
gold).  It's scenario #145 in my set and I've been playing it at 
slaughter.  The druids keep summoning faeries, even when there are 
already 250 opponents.  It wouldn't half as difficult if the spells of 
protection would disappear when opponent is destroyed or bombs/poison 
clouds destroyed those spells of protection.
